name: Test item
description: Test description

name: Dancing Queens
description: This dance is a fusion of the pop songs from our youth, introduced in Hindi music as Indian pop remixes. Dancing to these tracks brings back cherished memories, allowing us to relive the vibrant energy of our time. Through these private album songs, we are reconstructing our 'Yaadein'—rebuilding the beautiful moments of our past.

name: Medley Journey
description: Medley of Fusion Beats journey

name: Devarattam - A Folk Reverie
description: "Madura Palapalakuthu", a vibrant folk dance that celebrates the rustic rhythms and spirit of the land

name: Yaadon ki baraat
description: TBD

name: Spring Boots - A Dance Through Time
description: Joyous journey from the carefree days of childhood to the vibrant classrooms of youth — a celebration of friendship, fun, and the unforgettable moments that shaped who we are.

name: Harey Krishna
description: This is a Bharatanatyam in praise of Lord Krishna.

name: Rewind & Rhythm
description:
A group of lifelong friends, now in their golden years, reunite after years apart. As they gather, memories come flooding back—fun-filled days attending Bharatanatyam classes as children, practicing intricate movements, and performing together on stage. Inspired by nostalgia, they jokingly wish for a rewind button to relive those joyful moments. 

Encouraged by their shared passion and youthful spirit, they realize that age is just a number. With newfound enthusiasm, they join their daughters in a vibrant, scintillating thillana, demonstrating that the love for dance and life’s joy remains timeless. The performance becomes a celebration of friendship, memories, and the enduring power of dance to connect generations and rekindle the youthful spark within us all.

name: Krishna
description: Krishna - the divine charmer of Vrindavan. The embodiment of love, mischief, and cosmic wisdom, whose stories echo across ages through music, poetry, and dance. This performance begins with the tender, sacred bond between Yashoda and Krishna. She fed him, scolded him, chased after him when he stole butter, and tied him to a grinding stone — only to glimpse the entire universe in his mouth. Through her eyes, we see not just the Lord, but a mischievous, loving child. From this playful innocence, the story flows into the enchanted forests of Vrindavan, where Radha and Krishna’s divine love blooms. Radha is not just a lover, but the highest symbol of bhakti — selfless, surrendering, eternal. This performance weaves these sacred threads — the mother’s boundless love, the devotee’s longing, and the eternal beauty of Krishna.

name: Pinga
description:
Rooted in the traditional Lavani dance form, Pinga is a celebration of womanhood, grace, and festive spirit. Traditionally performed during joyous occasions by women, Pinga is characterized by swift circular movements, intricate footwork, and expressive hand gestures, all wrapped in the beauty of the Nauvari saree.

Let the beats of Pinga sweep you into a world of tradition, beauty, and powerful feminine energy.

name: Kavadi
description: This sacred ritual dance is an offering to Lord Murugan, the warrior son of Shiva and Parvati, the protector of dharma, and the slayer of demons. Performed by devotees during the Thaipusam festival, the Kavadi is more than a burden — it is a symbol of surrender, a vow, a prayer carried not just on the shoulders, but in the soul.

name: Ranu Mumbai ki Ranu
description:
With a fusion of Bollywood, hip-hop, and desi swag, this dance is packed with expressions, sass, and explosive energy. The performers embody Ranu’s fearless confidence.

So, get ready for a whirlwind of music, rhythm, and power, as we present:
“Ranu – Mumbai ki Ranu” — a celebration of confidence, courage, and unstoppable girl power!

name: Aarambh
description: Bollywood fusion dance

name: Moh Ke Dhaage
description: This semi-classical rendition of a well-known Hindustani classical song weaves through the delicate, invisible threads that bind a soul to the memory of their beloved. A love so mesmerizing, its presence lingers with all the vividness of the present moment. Set to a beautifully re-imagined musical score, this piece is a celebration of connection, remembrance, and the enchantment that never truly fades.
choreographers: PRIYANKA PRADHAN, Arushee Kamra, Anand Varahala, Spandana Kankanala, Dhanya Narayanan, soumya Pillai, Priya Narayanan, Saithya Painkal, Snigdha Chanduri

name: Rhythm Rebels
description: Girls perform semiclassical Bharathanatyam moves to the vibrant fast veenai instrumental music

name: TEST1
description: TEST 2025

description: Bollywood sance

description: Bollywood fun

description: Bollywood dance

name: Samudramanthan
description: Mythological dance-drama performance by the male and female trained dancers with latest Hindi devotional songs, background dialogues and screen play and projection

name: Bollywood Divas
description: Bollywood group dance

name: Dance n Divas
description: Bollywood fusion

name: Fitoor Dance Co
description: Vibrant and energetic dance by Fitoor Dance Co's Junior Team

name: Bollywood Through decades
description:
Embarking on “Yaadon Ka Safar” — A Nostalgic Journey Through Bollywood

Join us as we take a heartfelt walk down memory lane with "Yaadon Ka Safar" — a tribute to the timeless legacy of Indian cinema. From the golden era of the 1950s to the vibrant films of 2025, this journey celebrates the evolution of Bollywood through its unforgettable stories, iconic music, and cultural milestones.

Our little shining stars will bring this cinematic journey to life, showcasing the magic of each decade with performances that reflect the soul of Indian cinema. Get ready to relive the charm, drama, rhythm, and romance that have made Bollywood a beloved part of our lives for generations.

name: Beats on the streets
description: Dance performance by boys under 12

name: Graceful divas
description: We are group of 8 people dancing for the fusion songs with semiclassical touch.
choreographers: Vaishaly Kandulva padmanaban, Rama Devi Rajendran

name: Classical Bollywood Remix
description: Blending the grace of Kathak with beautiful Tabla bols, and beats of Tauba Tauba our performance captures the feeling of memories that stay with us. The rhythmic footwork, fast spins, and expressive storytelling of Kathak demonstrate the emotional depth of cherished memories, while the upbeat modern beats symbolize the joy and spontaneity that make those moments unforgettable.
choreographers: Roopa Luktuke, Nidhi Ramkishore, Varsha Hegde, Sadhya Alekhya Bhamidi

name: Thandav Trance
description: “Thandav Trance” is not just a dance performance — it is an immersive experience that fuses the sacred with the contemporary, blending traditional Indian dance with the electrifying energy of trance music. These dancers will leave the audience in awe by their sharp, precise, and stunning movements.

name: Chennai Express
description: A high-energy ride through the vibrant sounds, sights, and rhythms of South India! This dance brings together a colorful medley of South Indian folk beats, cinematic flair, and infectious joy.

name: When Play Meant Freedom
description:
There was a time — not too long ago, when childhood lived outside. When laughter echoed through the gullies, and scraped knees were medals of adventure.There were no likes or followers, just friendships built on trust, teasing, and team spirit.
No blue lights, just golden sunsets.
No filters — just real, messy, beautiful moments.

These were the days...

name: The Flight of Memories
description: Children are the butterflies of time, fluttering through stages of life, leaving behind joy wherever they go. In this dance, the kids represent memories from childhood — flying free, innocent, and colorful. The setting is inspired by their time growing up and the dance is a tribute to the yaadein they are making together.

name: Bollywood Kal Aur Aaj
description: Bollywood Kal Aaj Aur Kal" is a vibrant dance drama that takes you on a journey through the evolution of Bollywood dance styles. From the classic moves of the golden era to the contemporary fusion of today, this presentation showcases the dynamic and ever-changing world of Bollywood , it’s a celebration of the rich cultural heritage of Bollywood dance, with a modern twist. It's a visual and auditory treat that will leave you mesmerized and entertained.

name: Yaadon ka Jalsa : A Harvest of Golden Days
description:
This is more than just a dance...
This is a journey — a tribute to the heartbeat of our land — the farmer.

Through each powerful step and vibrant rhythm,
Nikita’s BDA Jalsa Team brings to life a story that unfolds year after year —Of sowing seeds with sweat and hope, Of watching the skies, praying for rain, Of waiting, working, and finally — rejoicing in the golden harvest.

The harvest was more than just a season —
it was a celebration of hard work, hope, and home.
Dhol beats in the distance, the scent of warm rotis,
laughter under lanterns...
Those aren’t just moments —
they’re yaadein that still live in the rhythm of our hearts.

name: A Journey Between Worlds (Dance Drama of a Girl’s Journey from India to the USA)
description:
She left behind the colors of India, with a heart full of memories and a suitcase of dreams. In the USA, she searched for a new life —
between homesickness and hope, between tradition and change.This is her journey —
a dance of identity, courage, and rediscovery.
From the soil of home to the streets of a new world...
this is the story of every girl who dares to begin again presented by Nikitasbda dance moms

name: we take you back in the era of freedom
description:
We Take You Back...
Tonight,
we take you back to an era of courage, where warriors rose against the Mughals, and love stood quietly behind them.

Maharana Pratap fought with pride, Shivaji Maharaj with strategy, Guru Gobind Singh Ji with unshaken faith And behind them mothers, wives, and lovers who prayed, waited, and hoped.
Let the story begin... with this epic performance by nikitasbda students

name: Masala Bhangra Performance
description: Masala Bhangra is celebrating 25 years, and Sarina Jain, the founder, has asked me to put a performance together featuring my students. The music will include a mix of classic Bhangra and Bollywood songs.

name: Shubho Aagomoni: Memories of Maa's Homecoming
description:
As part of this year’s Hum Sub theme “Yaadein – Ek Suhana Safar,” we are proud to present “Shubho Aagomoni: Memories of Maa’s Homecoming”—a vibrant celebration of the arrival of Maa Durga, deeply rooted in Bengali tradition, music, and cultural spirit.

Durga Puja, especially in Bengal, is more than a festival—it's an emotion, a homecoming, and a journey filled with music, memories, and devotion. This performance recreates the aagman (arrival) of Maa Durga through a visual dance story that reflects the anticipation, joy, and spiritual vibrance of every Bengali household during this sacred time.

The performance captures key cultural elements:

Traditional Bengali movements and mudras interwoven with expressive dance.

Iconic aarti and dhaak beats celebrating the divine energy.

Emotional resonance with songs and narration reflecting the bond between Maa and her children.

Through this piece, we reflect not only on the mythology but also on the nostalgia that Durga Puja evokes—echoing the collective memory of a community, a family, and a time when hearts reunite in reverence and joy.

name: Auntiji
description: Young man admiring senior young looking auntie and ask to getup dance aunties are dancing in their past life memories

name: Salam-e-Aish! - Cinema to Sindhoor thak ka suhana safar
description: A high energy performance, the dancers adorned in lehenga choli will showcase the unique and varied dance forms of India - Garba, Ghoomar, Semi-classical and bollywood. Keeping in mind this year's theme - Yaadein. We decided to remember, cherish and bring back the beautiful memories associated with some of Aishwarya's evergreen classics! she ruled the Indian Cinema with her beauty for years and also proved her personality is bigger than her beauty, when she stood tall at the Cannes Festival donning the Sindhoor, showing solidarity to her nation! This is a tribute and an opportunity to celebrate and rejoice the memories from the 90s!!

name: 90’s Nostalgic
description: Fusion of folk+Bollywood beats

name: Sweethearts Sizzle
description: Get ready for an adorable and energetic performance as our team “Sweethearts" take the stage! These delightful dancers will charm you with their joyful moves to a vibrant mashup of three popular Tamil songs. Watch as they bring a burst of color and rhythm, showcasing their innocent enthusiasm and budding talent in this special routine. It's a heartwarming display of teamwork and the sweet spirit of dance!

name: Bollybeats
description: Teens group dance

name: Draupadi
description:
As part of this year’s Hum Sub celebration of “Yaadein – Ek Suhana Safar”, we are honored to present a dance drama titled "Draupadi’s  a poignant reflection on one of the most unforgettable and defining moments in the epic journey of Indian history.

This performance revisits the emotionally charged episode of the Chausar—a royal game of dice between the Pandavas and Kauravas—that ultimately leads to the unjust humiliation of Draupadi in the royal court. Yet, through this moment of despair emerges an everlasting memory of resilience and divine grace, as Lord Krishna intervenes to uphold dharma and dignity. It is a story etched into the cultural memory of every generation—a moment that defines strength, faith, and justice in the face of betrayal.

The entire scene is brought to life through Kathak-based classical choreography, Durga Stuti, and expressive dramatic acting, capturing the intensity, grace, and emotional weight of the event. The performance not only aligns with the theme of cherished memories and cultural legacy but also connects today’s generation to the timeless journey of our traditions.

Total Participants: 16 children currently undergoing intensive training in classical dance and dramatization.

Dance Style: Classical (Kathak) complemented by expressive theater and devotional elements.

Performance Duration: Though originally allotted 8 minutes, we have refined the piece to 5 minutes to respect time limits and accommodate fellow performers.

name: Devdas: Presented by the Green Level High School Bollywood Dance Club

choreographers: Kanmani Madhanraj, Tarita Vakada, Kailyn Pereira, Rashmi Vijay

name: Tehzeeb-e-Kathak: The Grace of Lucknow Gharana
description:
This performance is a nostalgic journey into the elegant world of Kathak, as envisioned by Padma Vibhushan Pt. Birju Maharaj.

Drawing from the refined Lucknow Gharana, this piece captures the subtle grace (naazakat), expressive storytelling (abhinaya), and timeless beauty that define Kathak. It's not just a dance — it's a memory woven in rhythm, a tribute to legacy, and a celebration of culture passed down through generations.

name: Garvi Gujarat - Passion for Garba
description: Our performance will show  High energy Garba on traditional Garba songs - remembering our childhood Garba times and continued love for Garba. This dance is choreographed by Raam Leela Garba by Hina Kapadia and Khushboo Patel

name: The memories of rain through bollywood
description: In this dance we would like to depict the joy and nostalgia during the rainy season through a story created by bollywood rain songs over the last two decades.

name: Memories of our Motherland
description: It is a pure telugu folk song describing the beauty and greatness of motherland - India

name: Re Ma Pa Ni
description:
“Re Ma Pa Ni” is a musical journey—a suhana safar—through the soul of India. Set in the joyful Raag Brindavani Sarang, this vibrant composition blends the rich textures of Indian classical music and folk traditions with the uplifting energy of western beats.

Evoking the colors of sunlit farmlands and the earthy aroma of Indian soil, the music stirs memories of simpler times and cherished roots. It’s a nostalgic ode to home—each note a footstep on a path we once knew.

This experience is brought to life through the graceful storytelling of Kathak and traditional Indian folk dance, blending expressive movement with rhythm to celebrate the timeless spirit of our cultural heritage.

name: Hero Number 1
description: Get ready for a high-energy performance where the boys bring full-on Bollywood swag! With power moves, dramatic flair, and unstoppable attitude, they channel their inner heroes.

name: Rang Marathi- Colors of Maharashra
description: Medley of 3 Marathi songs that show evolution of Marathi music through years

name: Pop Punjabi Beats : Daler Mehndi Pop Punjabi medley
description: Medley of 3 Daler Mehndi Pop songs from 1990s

name: Cham Cham Cham
description: A fusion of blooywood and western styles like ballet, jazz, and contemporary, this dance showcases the joy of life and beauty of nature.

name: Fusion Fiesta
description: A festive explosion of styles and sounds, Fusion Fiesta merges folk beats with Bollywood glam and classical roots. This piece is all about vibrant costumes, coordinated energy, and the unifying power of dance.

name: Rhythm of Lights A Fusion Fiesta
description:
Step into the spirit of Diwali with **"Rhythm of Lights,"** a high-voltage dance journey that blends the soul of Indian folk, the flair of Western beats, and the glam of Hollywood grooves. From the heart-thumping tharai thappattai of Tamil Nadu to the electric energy of Tollywood and Bollywood chartbusters, this performance celebrates light, joy, and unity through rhythm and movement.
Get ready for a whirlwind of colors, cultures, and choreography that will light up the stage—just like Diwali lights up our hearts!

name: Adaa Jashn
description: This Bollywood dance begins with the graceful “Silsila Ye Chahat Ka,” setting a dramatic and traditional mood. It transitions into the lively “Aaja Nachle,” filling the stage with joy and celebration. Jhalla Wallah” brings bold energy and sass to the finale. Together, the songs create a vibrant performance full of emotion, color, and classic Bollywood flair.

name: Mean Girls Vibe
description: Group performance by 10 girls for medley of all forms of dances

name: Bollywood Bonanza
description: A celebration of Bollywood through upbeat songs, dynamic formations, and electrifying spirit.

name: Garvi Gujarat
description: A joyful celebration of tradition and togetherness, this Garba performance brings the vibrant spirit of Gujarat to the stage! With colorful costumes, rhythmic claps, and energetic footwork, the dancers honor the festive spirit of Navratri and the joy of dancing in circles to celebrate the divine.

name: Retro in Metro
description: Vintage dances on modern beats

name: Samundar Ki Shaan - Koli Dance
description: Set against the backdrop of the Arabian Sea, this spirited performance captures the vibrant culture of Maharashtra’s Koli community. With rhythmic footwork, playful gestures, and dynamic group formations, the dancers bring to life the daily joys and struggles of coastal life

name: Desi Beats Reloaded
description: A high-energy performance that reimagines traditional Indian dance for the modern stage. With electrifying transitions between folk, Bollywood, and semi-classical styles, Desi Beats Reloaded is a celebration of rhythm, roots, and reinvention.

name: Rajwadi Odhni
description: A vibrant tribute to Rajasthan’s royal heritage, this dance blends graceful spins, colorful costumes, and folk rhythms to celebrate the pride and elegance of the traditional odhni. Get ready for a regal swirl of energy and tradition!

name: Dancing Divas
description: A vibrant showcase of cultural blending, where traditional Indian dance form like Bharatanatyam and Dandiya is creatively combined with modern Bollywood freestyle. Costumes will be a mix of traditional Indian attire and modern outfits.

name: Desi Vibes Reloaded
description: Get ready for a fun and fabulous Bollywood fusion full of energy and style! With hit songs, our teen performers light up the stage with vibrant moves, big smiles, and loads of confidence. It’s a celebration of dance, music, and all things desi!

name: Folk dance
description: Group of 6 people participating for folk dance

name: Tamizhachis
description: Traditional Tamil dance forms such as Parai, Kolattam, Kummiyattam and Oyilattam.  Traditional Indian costume.

name: A Timeless Tribute
description: we celebrate not just a performance—but a legacy. This dance item is a heartfelt tribute to one of Bollywood's most iconic and beloved actresses, whose grace, talent, and screen presence have inspired generations. Through her unforgettable roles, dazzling dance numbers, and indelible charm, she ruled the silver screen and captured our hearts.

name: Dil Ki Patang
description: Little kids presenting the state of Gujarat by performing a folk style on this Bollywood song "Dil ki Patang" , celebrating the vibrant festival of Makar Sankranti featuring iconic traditions like kite-flying and Garba dance.

name: Rangratri
description: The Rangtaari song from the movie Loveratri is a peppy dance number that celebrates the festive spirit of Navratri in Gujarat. The song perfectly encapsulates the festive atmosphere and is a perfect festival track.

name: YAADEIN – Ek Suhana Safar A tribute to the legendary Saroj Khan
description:
This performance is a heartfelt celebration of Saroj Khan’s timeless legacy. Through graceful movements and expressive storytelling, we revisit her iconic choreographies that defined Bollywood’s golden era.

From the elegance of Madhuri to the charm of Sridevi, each piece honors the adaayein, nazakat, and emotion that Masterji brought to the screen.

Join us as we dance through memories—remembering Saroj Khan, whose art continues to inspire generations.

name: A Dance Tribute to India's Brave Soldiers,
description: Join us in this heartfelt Bollywood dance tribute dedicated to the valiant soldiers of India who have selflessly protected our nation since its independence in 1947. This performance honors the spirit, sacrifice, and strength of our armed forces who stood tall in every war India has faced

name: Twisters
description: An energetic dance show by the amazing boys of Friendship Vibes dance studio!

name: Desi Mass Folk Fusion
description: Graceful & High energy folk fusion dance for trending music mix in different desi languages

name: Pride of MP
description: Get ready for a colorful ride through Madhya Pradesh ! From the graceful twirls of Malwa, to the bold beats of Bundelkhand, and the wild energy of Nimad, this performance brings you the best of folk dances from the heart of India. Performed by the members of Madhya Pradesh Association of Triangle. Choreographed by Shuchita Sakwaya.

name: Pinga g Pori Pinga from Bajirao Mastani Movie.
description:
🌸Why “Pinga” Fits the Theme – Yaadein: Ek Suhana Safar
Our performance of “Pinga G Pori Pinga” is a heartfelt tribute to the rich cultural storytelling and nostalgic memories that define this year’s theme, “Yaadein – Ek Suhana Safar.”

Set in the grandeur of the Peshwa era, this dance reflects traditional Maharashtrian culture, inspired by festive gatherings like Haldi-Kunku — where women came together to celebrate, share laughter, and express sisterhood. By presenting this in the Folk Fusion style of Lavani, we aim to relive those golden moments through vibrant expressions, costumes, and rhythm.

We imagine this performance as a nostalgic celebration — perhaps a grandmother reminiscing about her youth, a mother recalling Ganpati festivals from her village, or a group of women recreating the joy of old gatherings.

“Pinga” – A Celebration of Timeless Bonds
Through this performance, we invite you to journey with us into the past — to a time of shared traditions, graceful joy, and cultural unity. It’s our way of honoring the beauty of memory and the enduring connections that make every suhana safar meaningful.
